Detailed Description

Base class for Client and Server Socket endpoints

int &  value 
)

return the socket options TCP_NODELAY, SO_LINGER, FD_CLOEXEC, SO_REUSEADDR, SO_RCVBUF, SO_SNDBUF, SO_RCVLOWAT, SO_SNDLOWAT, SO_NOSIGPIPE, SO_DONTROUTE and O_NONBLOCK

  • value

void SOCKNET::Socket::set_fd ( int  fd  ) 

initialize from already existing socket

  • fd valid file-descriptor
    Warning:
    initialization may fail, check isConnected() afterwards
    using this constructor will result in loss of the socket origin!
void SOCKNET::Socket::set_sockopt ( int  opt,
int  value 
)

permit to manipulate the socket options TCP_NODELAY, SO_LINGER, FD_CLOEXEC, SO_REUSEADDR, SO_RCVBUF, SO_SNDBUF, SO_RCVLOWAT, SO_SNDLOWAT, SO_NOSIGPIPE, SO_DONTROUTE and O_NONBLOCK

  • opt option (no_delay, clo_exec, reuseaddr)
  • value
void SOCKNET::Socket::shutdown ( SHUT_MODE  mode  ) 

shutdown socket

Parameters:
mode READ_P : shutdown the read-half part of the socket
mode WRITE_P : shutdown the write-half part of the socket
mode READWRITE_P : shutdown both part of the socket
